mean_en: to trick or cheat someone or something in order to get money :to use fraud in order to get money from a person, an organization, etc.
word_etyma: de加强 + fraud欺诈 → defraud 欺骗
sentence: An unskilled crook is trying to defraud my account by using a fake message.
sentence_trans: 有个拙劣的骗子想通过虚假信息骗取我的钱财。
